name: Chaotic Factory
description:
This game was made in 3 hours for the FNGJ with the theme: Enemies as weapons.

[Controls]

WASD Movement

W - Jump

Left click: Attack enemies with the skull when collected

Right click: Chuck your enemy weapon

[Objective]

You're stuck on a conveyor belt with only one option, fight the mobs coming your way! You must utilize the weapons given to you as they appear and fight off the mobs to come.

[Tips]

  • The enemy weapon you gain is durable for a certain amount of hits.
  • The mobs will drop a weapon for you to use after using up your previous weapon.
  • The red skeleton takes 2 hits from your weapon while the regular skeleton takes one.
  • Regular skeleton deals 10 damage. Red skeleton deals double. Your player has only 50 health.

[Credits]

Font used: 04 Font - Yuji Oshimoto
